Content:: The Congress of the Federated States of Micronesia has 14 non-partisan members: ten members elected for a two-year term in ten single-seat constituencies and four members elected for a four-year term, one from each state at-large. The Speaker of the Congress is elected for a term of two years. Members after the FSM General Election of March 3, 2015.[5]  This legislature-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This Federated States of Micronesia article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Congress of the Federated States of Micronesia - Wikipedia
